lead_paragraph: A Mercyhurst (Pa.) College volleyball player was charged yesterday with killing the baby she secretly gave birth to in her campus apartment bathroom. The player, Teri Rhodes, 18, hid the pregnancy from friends and teammates, the Erie police said, and passed a sports physical that cleared her to play volleyball two days before she gave birth, the police said.
